text: The Boys in the Band is a 1970 American drama movie directed by William Friedkin and was based on the 1968 play of the same name by Mart Crowley. It stars Kenneth Nelson, Leonard Frey, Cliff Gorman, Laurence Luckinbill, Frederick Combs, Keith Prentice, Reuben Greene and Elaine Kaufman. It was distributed by National General Pictures. It was remade in 2020. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:1970 LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies directed by William Friedkin
title: The Boys in the Band (1970 movie)
